name: Building Anti Terrorist Mission
description: Building Anti Terrorist Mission is a action First Person Shooting war Game. You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Faced with this situation of you have no choice but to grasp the nettle.From the M16 to AK47 and sniper guns, as you have access to a variety of light and heavy weapons, as well as powerful grenade too!In the battle you will be sent to different locations to perform the difficult task
